actions.text: Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.
Received in the Senate. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 35.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A concurrent resolution to commend Lieutenant General Lincoln D. Faurer for exceptionally distinguished service to the United States of America.

summary.text: Commends Lieutenant General Lincoln D. Faurer for exceptionally distinguished service to the U.S. Air Force, the national and defense intelligence communities, and the national security of the United States. Urges the President to award the National Security Medal to Lieutenant General Lincoln D. Faurer.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to commend Lieutenant General Lincoln D. Faurer for exceptionally distinguished service to the United States of America.
